sqlMap.sql: SELECT m1.id AS id , m1.icon AS icon , ( CASE WHEN(m2.id = 0 OR m2.id IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE m2.id END ) AS pcode , m1.name AS name, m1.url AS url, m1.levels AS levels , m1.ismenu AS ismenu , m1.num AS num FROM sys_menu m1 LEFT JOIN sys_menu m2 ON m1.pcode = m2.code INNER JOIN( SELECT ID FROM sys_menu WHERE ID IN( SELECT menuid FROM sys_relation rela WHERE rela.roleid = ? ) ) m3 ON m1.id = m3.id WHERE m1.ismenu = 1 ORDER BY levels , num ASC
